channel.title: Variation 718/745 ll Economy Based ll Drygores & Ascension ll Custom Bosses
channel.description:
Variation 718 loading 745
We believe in the journey
About Variation. We started this server over a couple of years ago. Me and my best friend had been playing Runescape for over 6 years and we thought since there were so many people making private servers we made one ourselves. So we did after a couple of weeks of struggling we got our own server! We were very excited to launch the server but there weren’t much opportunities for us to grow big. So after a couple of months we shut the server down and we were pissed. But after all that we now finally decided to laugh up again with a better hosting program and with way more coding skills.
Why should you play Variation?
I like to start off by saying we are very friendly and willing to help at all time. We make sure that the players get what they want. Such as updates and bug fixes. Since it’s a small server we want to get as much attention as we can so there will be a lot of events going on in the near future. Me and my best friend (in game name Chewy) Hope to see you very soon!
[img]http://i.imgur.com/uzkucck.jpg?1[/img]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/gho7Lgk.png?1[/img]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/8MJr81c.jpg[/img]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/q5dgPZr.jpg?1[/img]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/RilawJq.jpg?1[/img]
[[img]http://i.imgur.com/CeTeEzX.png?1[/img]
[B][U]*Some Features!*[/U][/B]
Lag Free Server Active Staff Members All special attacks + effects. Loyalty Points for being active Godwars Bosses Korasi's Sword Flawless Combat Working Shop Interface Buttons Working AutoCasting Dominion Tower with rewards Corporeal Beast Great Home Spirit Shield Creation Private Messaging Summoning Scroll & Pouch creation All Skills are Trainable Working Spellbooks + Prayer book including Turmoil Obtainable Completionist Cape & Trimmed Friends Chat + Symbols Dungeoneering System (Custom) Decent, stable and an enjoyable economy Trading + Tabs Custom DonatorZone Xp Counter Staff of Light Yell System + Custom tags Custom title Maker Regular Updates All Drygore weapons Ascentions Custom Home (Party Room ) Donator Boxes!
Most importantly we are very original!
Forums:[URL=http://"http://variation.enjin.com/"] Variation.enjin.com[/URL]
Download Client : [url=https://www.dropbox.com/s/0v7nf0nee61u26m/Variation.jar?dl=0]https://www.dropbox.com/s/0v7nf0nee61u26m/Variation.jar?dl=0[/url]

item.description:
@blackpeanut wrote:

Variation 718 loading 745

We believe in the journey

About Variation.
We started this server over a couple of years ago.
Me and my best friend had been playing Runescape for over 6 years and we thought since there were so many people making private servers we made one ourselves.
So we did after a couple of weeks of struggling we got our own server!
We were very excited to launch the server but there weren’t much opportunities for us to grow big.
So after a couple of months we shut the server down and we were pissed.
But after all that we now finally decided to laugh up again with a better hosting program and with way more coding skills.

Why should you play Variation?

I like to start off by saying we are very friendly and willing to help at all time.
We make sure that the players get what they want.
Such as updates and bug fixes.
Since it’s a small server we want to get as much attention as we can so there will be a lot of events going on in the near future.
Me and my best friend (in game name Chewy) Hope to see you very soon!

[

[B][U]Some Features![/U][/B]

Lag Free Server
Active Staff Members
All special attacks + effects.
Loyalty Points for being active
Godwars Bosses
Korasi’s Sword
Flawless Combat
Working Shop Interface Buttons
Working AutoCasting
Dominion Tower with rewards
Corporeal Beast
Great Home
Spirit Shield Creation
Private Messaging
Summoning Scroll & Pouch creation
All Skills are Trainable
Working Spellbooks + Prayer book including Turmoil
Obtainable Completionist Cape & Trimmed
Friends Chat + Symbols
Dungeoneering System (Custom)
Decent, stable and an enjoyable economy
Trading + Tabs
Custom DonatorZone
Xp Counter
Staff of Light
Yell System + Custom tags
Custom title Maker
Regular Updates
All Drygore weapons
Ascentions
Custom Home (Party Room )
Donator Boxes!

Most importantly we are very original!
